EmailTemplate.name: Alliances DX
EmailTemplate.subject: Hello / Copado Update / Available to meet at DX?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Quick update from Copado -- the #1 Native DevOps for Salesforce.
At TrailheaDX, Copado will be announcing: - A new version of our leading Salesforce DevOps product - And a new Copado Partner Referral Program
Will you be at DX and have some time for a quick chat in our booth?
Thank you,
Jeff Engelmann Copado -- a Salesforce Ventures company SVP Corp Dev & Alliances (415) 828-2229
